title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
**Wake Up to a Fresh Brew with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Sleek Black**

Start your day with ease and efficiency with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This sleek black coffee maker is designed to fit into any kitchen with its space-saving 8-inch width, ensuring you don't have to compromise on taste or countertop real estate.

**Quick and Customizable Brewing**
Choose from three convenient brew sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz) to create your perfect cup of coffee in under a minute. Whether you need a strong dose to jumpstart your morning or a milder cup for a leisurely afternoon, the Keurig K-Compact delivers without the wait.

**Smart Features for the Modern Home**
- **Smart Start**: Your coffee maker heats and then brews in one simple process, so there's no need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Simple Button Controls**: Brew your perfect cup with the ease of intuitive button controls.
- **Energy Efficient**: With an auto-off feature set to activate after 2 hours of inactivity, you'll save energy without a second thought.

**Convenience at Its Best**
- **36 oz. Removable Water Reservoir**: Refill less often and easily detach the reservoir for quick filling and cleaning.
- **Removable Drip Tray**: Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and can hold a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water on Demand**: Dispense hot water with the push of a button, perfect for making instant soups, teas, or hot cocoa.

**Compatibility and Sustainability**
Use your favorite K-Cup pods to find that perfect taste, or go green with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter (not included). Please note that packaging may vary, as we are constantly improving our products to enhance your brewing experience.

Embrace the simplicity of single-serve brewing without sacrificing variety and quality. The Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is your solution to quick, customizable, and delicious coffee at home. Add it to your kitchen lineup today and sip in satisfaction tomorrow.

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Transform your mornings and indulge in the convenience and quality of the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit your fast-paced lifestyle without compromising on flavor, this sleek black coffee maker is the perfect addition to any kitchen or office space.

**Product Features:**

- **Multiple Brew Sizes:** Choose from 6, 8, or 10-ounce brew sizes to customize the strength and quantity of your coffee, ensuring every cup is just right.
- **Rapid Brew Time:** Enjoy your favorite hot beverage in under a minute. Fast and efficient, it's perfect for those on-the-go moments.
- **Large Water Reservoir:** Comes with a 36-ounce removable water tank, minimizing the need for constant refills and making it easy to clean.
- **Smart Start:** Your coffee maker heats and brews in one simple process - no need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Simple Button Controls:** Intuitive and user-friendly, the button controls make selecting your desired settings a breeze.
- **Energy Efficient:** Equipped with an auto-off feature that activates after 2 hours of inactivity, saving energy and giving you peace of mind.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** Not only does it capture drips to keep your counter clean, but it also accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water on Demand:** Need hot water for tea, soups, or oatmeal? This coffee maker dispenses hot water with the simple press of a button.
- **Compact Size:** At just 8 inches wide, this coffee maker is perfectly compact, making it suitable for smaller spaces while still delivering full-sized flavor.
- **Compatibility:** This versatile machine works with all K-Cup pods and is also compatible with the My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately), giving you endless options to satiate your coffee cravings.
- **Packaging May Vary:** Please note that packaging and design may vary, ensuring the latest model and features are delivered to you.

Elevate your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact and start each day with the perfect cup of coffee, tailored just the way you like it. Whether you're a coffee aficionado or just looking for a quick and convenient way to get your caffeine fix, the Keurig K-Compact is the ideal choice. Order yours today and savor the simplicity and excellence of Keurig brewing.

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker (Black)**

Wake up each morning to the rich, fresh-brewed flavor of your favorite coffee with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed with convenience and quality in mind, this sleek black coffee maker is the perfect addition to any kitchen, dorm room, or office space.

**Product Features:**

- **Quick Brew Time:** Enjoy your coffee in no time at all with a fast brew time of under a minute.
- **Multiple Brew Sizes:** Choose from three cup sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz) to customize the strength and quantity of your coffee just the way you like it.
- **Large Water Reservoir:** The 36 oz. water reservoir is removable for easy refilling and cleaning, ensuring you can brew multiple cups before needing to refill.
- **Smart Start:** A simple and intuitive start process heats and then brews in one simple process, saving you time.
- **Button Controls:** Effortlessly brew your perfect cup with easy-to-use button controls.
- **Energy Efficient:** With an auto-off feature that powers down the brewer 2 hours after the last brew, you'll save energy without lifting a finger.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** The drip tray not only catches drips and spills but also accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Need hot water for tea, oatmeal, or instant soup? This coffee maker also dispenses hot water with the press of a button.
- **Compact Design:** Measuring just 8 inches in width, this slim and stylish coffee maker fits neatly on any countertop without taking up too much space.
- **Pod Compatibility:** Use with your favorite K-Cup pods for a perfect cup every time. Note that it is not compatible with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter.

Whether you're rushing off to work or enjoying a leisurely weekend morning, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker delivers the perfect cup of coffee with ease and elegance. Please be aware that packaging may vary.

Don't wait to start your mornings off right. Add the Keurig K-Compact to your cart today and savor the convenience and taste of quality brewed coffee anytime you want!

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Wake up to a perfect cup of coffee with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed with convenience and simplicity in mind, this sleek black coffee maker is the perfect addition to any kitchen, office, or dorm room. 

**Key Features:**
- **Multiple Brew Sizes:** Enjoy your coffee just the way you like it with three brew sizes (6, 8, and 10 oz.).
- **Quick Brew Time:** Get your coffee fix fast with a brewing time of under a minute.
- **Removable Water Reservoir:** The 36 oz. water reservoir is not only sizeable but also removable, making refills and cleaning a breeze.
- **Smart Start Technology:** Your coffee maker heats and then brews in one simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Simple Button Controls:** Brew your perfect cup of coffee with easy-to-use button controls.
- **Energy Efficient:** With an auto-off feature that turns your coffee maker off after 2 hours of the last brew, you’ll save energy without a second thought.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** The drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Need hot water for your instant soup or oatmeal? This coffee maker can dispense hot water at the touch of a button.
- **Compact Size:** At just 8 inches wide, this coffee maker is perfectly compact for any space.
- **Compatibility:** Use a wide variety of K-Cup pod varieties or go eco-friendly with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (not included).

Whether you're rushing off to work or enjoying a lazy Sunday, the Keurig K-Compact Coffee Maker delivers a delicious, freshly brewed cup of coffee every time. Embrace the convenience and quality of Keurig, and transform the way you enjoy your favorite beverages.

*Please note that packaging may vary. The Keurig K-Compact Coffee Maker is designed for use with K-Cup pods and is not compatible with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter.*

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

**Overview:**
Wake up to a fresh, steaming cup of coffee in no time with the sleek and space-saving Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This stylish, black coffee maker is designed for efficiency and ease, fitting perfectly in any kitchen.

**Key Features:**

- **Versatile Brew Sizes:** Choose from three convenient brew sizes (6, 8, 10 oz) to suit your coffee strength preference.
- **Speedy Brew Time:** Enjoy your favorite hot beverage in under a minute, perfect for those rush hour mornings.
- **Removable Water Reservoir:** Features a 36 oz water tank that's easily detachable for quick refills and cleaning.
- **Smart Start:** Simplify your morning routine with the Smart Start feature that heats and brews in one simple process.
- **Intuitive Button Controls:** Effortlessly brew your coffee with the simple push of a button.
- **Energy Efficient:** The auto-off feature turns off your coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity, saving energy.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for an easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Need hot water for tea or instant meals? This coffee maker has you covered with a hot water dispensing feature.
- **Compact Size:** At just 8 inches wide, this coffee maker is a perfect fit for any countertop.
- **Pod Compatibility:** Use with a variety of K-Cup pod varieties or the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (Note: The actual compatibility with the reusable filter may vary).
- **Packaging May Vary:** Please note that packaging and design are subject to change.

**What's in the Box:**

- 1 x Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black
- 1 x Removable Water Reservoir
- 1 x Removable Drip Tray

**Enjoy a perfect cup of coffee, tea, or hot cocoa with the Keurig K-Compact Coffee Maker – your new favorite kitchen companion. Order now and elevate your daily coffee experience with convenience and style!**

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Wake up each morning to the rich, fresh-brewed aroma of your favorite coffee with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit perfectly on any countertop, this sleek black coffee maker is the ideal choice for coffee lovers who value convenience without compromising on quality.

**Product Features:**

- **Versatile Brew Sizes**: Choose from three convenient brew sizes - 6, 8, or 10 ounces - to customize the strength and quantity of your coffee to match your preference.
- **Lightning-Fast Brew Time**: In a hurry? Get your perfect cup of coffee in under a minute with our rapid brewing system.
- **Removable Water Reservoir**: The 36-ounce water reservoir is easily detachable for refilling and cleaning, ensuring fresh water for every brew.
- **Smart Start Functionality**: Simplify your morning routine with the Smart Start feature that heats and then brews in one simple process, saving you time.
- **Button Controls**: Effortlessly select your settings with the intuitive button controls for a user-friendly experience.
- **Energy Efficient**: Benefit from the auto-off feature that turns off your coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity, helping you save on your energy bills.
- **Removable Drip Tray**: The drip tray not only catches drips to keep your space clean, but it's also removable to accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and can hold a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water Dispense**: Need hot water for tea, oatmeal, or instant soups? Your Keurig can dispense hot water at the touch of a button.
- **Compact Size**: With a slim width of just 8 inches, this coffee maker fits snugly in any space, making it perfect for small kitchens or dorm rooms.
- **Compatibility**: Enjoy a vast array of K-Cup pod varieties, including the option to use your own coffee with the My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (not included).

**Additional Information:**

- **Dimensions**: With its 8-inch width, this coffee maker is as space-efficient as it is stylish and functional.
- **Packaging**: Please note that packaging may vary.

Start your day right with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, and savor the taste of gourmet coffee with the convenience and speed you deserve. Add it to your kitchen ensemble today and enjoy the ultimate coffee experience every day!

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Wake up to a perfect cup of coffee every morning with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit any countertop, this stylish black coffee maker offers convenience and versatility in one compact package. 

**Key Features:**

- **Multiple Brew Sizes**: Choose from three cup sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz) to create your perfect cup of coffee, tea, or hot cocoa in under a minute.
- **Large Water Reservoir**: The 36-ounce water reservoir is removable for easy filling and cleaning, ensuring you can brew multiple cups without the need to refill.
- **Smart Start & Button Controls**: Your coffee maker heats and then brews in one simple process with no need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Energy Efficient**: With an auto-off feature that turns off the coffee maker 2 hours after the last brew, you can save energy without a second thought.
- **Removable Drip Tray**: The drip tray can hold a full accidental brew for easy cleanup and can also be removed to accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall.
- **Hot Water Dispense**: Need hot water for instant meals or a warm beverage? This coffee maker can dispense hot water at the touch of a button.
- **Compact Size**: At only 8 inches wide, this coffee maker is perfectly compact for any space, whether it's your kitchen counter or office nook.
- **Compatibility**: Not only can you use any K-Cup pod to brew your favorite varieties, but this model is also compatible with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (not included) for your own ground coffee.
- **Packaging May Vary**: Please note that packaging and product appearance may vary, but the quality and specifications are consistent.

With the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, you're always just a minute away from a freshly brewed, great-tasting cup of your favorite beverage. Whether you're in a rush or taking it slow, your coffee routine just got a whole lot better.

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Start your mornings off right with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit any countertop, this sleek black coffee maker is the perfect companion for coffee lovers seeking convenience without sacrificing quality.

**Key Features:**
- **Versatile Brew Sizes:** Choose from 6, 8, or 10 oz. cups, allowing you to control the strength and quantity of your coffee to suit your preference.
- **Quick Brew Time:** Enjoy your favorite hot beverage in under a minute. Fast and efficient, perfect for those busy mornings or when you need an instant pick-me-up.
- **Removable Water Reservoir:** With a 36 oz. capacity, it minimizes refills and is easily detachable for convenient refilling and cleaning.
- **Smart Start Functionality:** Your coffee maker heats and then brews in one simple process – no need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
- **Simple Button Controls:** Intuitive and user-friendly, making your coffee experience hassle-free.
- **Energy Efficient:** Equipped with an auto-off feature that turns the coffee maker off 2 hours after the last brew, saving energy and giving you peace of mind.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** An added convenience for those who enjoy tea or instant soups.
- **Compact Size:** At 8 inches in width, it fits neatly on any countertop or small space.
- **Compatibility:** Works with all K-Cup pods and is also compatible with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (not included), allowing you to brew your own ground coffee.
- **Packaging May Vary:** Please note that the packaging may vary, but the same great features are guaranteed.

Whether you're a coffee aficionado or just need a quick cup to start your day, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is designed to deliver a delicious, refreshing beverage quickly and easily. With its combination of speed, efficiency, and customizable options, this coffee maker is sure to become an essential part of your daily routine.

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Wake up to the rich, fresh aroma of your favorite coffee with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit any countertop, the sleek black coffee maker is as stylish as it is functional, perfect for coffee lovers who appreciate convenience and quality.

**Product Features:**

- **Multiple Brew Sizes:** Choose from three cup sizes - 6, 8, or 10 oz. - to customize the strength and quantity of your beverage to suit your taste.
  
- **Quick Brew Time:** Enjoy your coffee in under a minute with rapid brewing technology, perfect for busy mornings or when you need that quick afternoon pick-me-up.

- **Large Water Reservoir:** A 36 oz. removable water tank means you can brew multiple cups before needing a refill, saving you time and effort.

- **Smart Start:** Simplify your morning routine with the Smart Start feature, which heats and then brews in one simple process for the fastest cup.

- **Button Controls:** Simple button controls make your coffee experience effortless from start to finish.

- **Energy Efficient:** Automatic shut-off after 2 hours helps conserve energy, giving you one less thing to worry about as you start your day.

- **Removable Drip Tray:** The removable drip tray makes cleanup a breeze and accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, so you can take your coffee on-the-go.

- **Hot Water Dispense:** Need hot water for tea, oatmeal, or instant soups? The hot water dispense function has you covered at the push of a button.

- **Compact Size:** At just 8 inches wide, this coffee maker fits comfortably on any countertop, making it ideal for smaller kitchens or office spaces.

- **Compatibility:** Use with a variety of K-Cup pod varieties to explore new flavors and beverages. Although not compatible with the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter, it's still a great choice for pod-based brewing.

- **Variable Packaging:** Please note that packaging may vary, but rest assured that the quality and performance of your coffee maker is our top priority.

Whether it's your first cup of the day or you're entertaining guests, the Keurig K-Compact Coffee Maker delivers a perfect cup every time. Embrace the convenience, versatility, and delicious results of Keurig brewing. Add the Keurig K-Compact to your kitchen today and savor the simplicity of great coffee.

**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black**

Wake up every morning to the rich, fresh aroma of perfectly brewed coffee with Keurig's K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to deliver convenience without compromising on quality, this sleek black coffee maker is a must-have for coffee lovers and busy professionals alike.

**Key Features:**

- **Multiple Brew Sizes:** Choose from three convenient brew sizes - 6, 8, and 10 oz - to create your perfect cup of coffee in under a minute.
- **Large Water Reservoir:** The 36 oz. water reservoir is removable for easy refilling and cleaning, ensuring that you can brew multiple cups before needing a refill.
- **Smart Start Technology:** Streamline your brewing process with Smart Start, which heats and brews in one simple process, saving you time.
- **Simple Button Controls:** Effortless button controls make your coffee experience smooth and straightforward.
- **Energy-Efficient:** With an auto-off feature that kicks in after 2 hours of inactivity, you'll save energy without lifting a finger.
- **Accommodates Travel Mugs:** The removable drip tray can hold a full accidental brew and makes room for travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, so you can take your coffee to go.
- **Hot Water on Demand:** Need hot water for tea, oatmeal, or instant soup? The hot water dispense feature has you covered.
- **Space-Saving Design:** At just 8 inches wide, this compact unit fits neatly on any countertop, making it perfect for smaller spaces.
- **Compatible With:** Enjoy a variety of K-Cup pod varieties and, although not included, this model is compatible with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter for even more brewing flexibility.
- **Packaging May Vary:** Please note that the packaging may vary, but the exceptional quality and performance of your Keurig coffee maker remain constant.

Enhance your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker and savor the simple pleasure of a perfect cup of coffee, every single time.
